author: wrolisonaflac
body:
Feature Request: Show Admin Title for Open here As Admin

If I run PowerShell 6 or PowerShell 7 as admin directly, "Administrator" is added to the window title as expected.

However, if I right click any folder and use the PowerShell context menu and choose "Open here as Administrator" , the title window does NOT have Administrator. Notice it is there for a split second while the window refreshes.

PowerShell 6 and PowerShell 7 effected.
